Introduction.What's product content?: Defines product content as every UI word shaping trust, clarity, and brand voice. It supports users, clarifies tasks, and builds emotional connection.
Introduction.Our approach: Write to clear paths, build trust, and emotionally connect. Prioritize simplicity, consistency, and empathy.
Introduction.Preferred terms: Use consistent, familiar terms and avoid jargon. Align language across products for clarity and recognition.
Introduction.Names and naming: Name features clearly and descriptively. Avoid ambiguity; choose intuitive, action‑oriented names.
